prekshaka - ane mage kata....ekak neweyi ona tharan thiyenawa...ayi thamunnanse ara krikat loka kusalaneka awasan tharangedi mokakda wigadamak karala kiwwe aniwaryen lankawa dinanawa kiyala..ko dinnada?ethakota 2010 ta kalin thibuna hama mathiwaranekadima wage “menna me sare tarnin poyint“ ekak kiya kiya kiwwe aanduwa paradinawa kiyala ko paradunada?ethakota janadhipathita maraka apala thiyenawa kiyala kata waraddagena thamunta hire yanna wunata kiwwa de hari giye nane.ayi ethakota 2012 agadi loka winashayaka aarambhaka lakshana mathuwenawa kiwwa neda?thawa ee madiwata 2013 mada hariyedi parasakwala praharayak ape loketa ella wenawa kiwwa mathakada?
